text: @realDonaldTrump Who will be watching over seniors protectively and lovingly? That sounds nice. But we're going to need a few more deets. Will Ivanka become the Princess Diana of the COVID19 virus? Walking among the people to show there is nothing to be afraid of? That would be helpful.
